nodes.text: HASH-19 was an assassin droid who was operating in the years of the Galactic Civil War. Appearing similar to a surveillance spy-eye, HASH-19 was a gold-chrome metallic ball. However, when provoked, six extensible arms were revealed, each armed with vibroblades. Employed by Moff Bandor, he was sent to patrol the Game Chambers of Questal.
